characters.name: Skipper
characters.profile: The commanding officer and leader of the squad, known for his unwavering confidence and strict adherence to protocol.
characters.classified_info: Has an irrational fear of needles and a mysterious history with a dolphin named Dr. Blowhole.

characters.name: Kowalski
characters.profile: The intellectual of the group who handles analysis, calculations and invention designs. Second in command.
characters.catchphrase: I've calculated our odds of success at approximately... [complex number]%
characters.classified_info: Maintains a secret crush on a doll named Doris and keeps a lab notebook that could compromise multiple operations.

characters.name: Rico
characters.profile: The team's demolitions and weapons specialist, suffering from a peculiar stomach condition that allows him to regurgitate any needed item.
characters.classified_info: Can hold over 100 unique items in his stomach at once. Has a romantic relationship with a plastic doll.

characters.name: Private
characters.profile: The youngest and most innocent member of the team, often serving as the heart of the group.
characters.catchphrase: Skipper, are you sure about this?
characters.classified_info: Has been secretly identified as possessing a hidden power (the Hyperforce ability) unknown to his teammates until recently.
